title: Stanford University Will Return 'Gifts' Donated by FTX: Report
description: Stanford University will be returning "gifts"  it received from FTX, allegedly orchestrated by Sam Bankman-Fried's parents, according to a Bloomberg report.

title: Lawyer Who Laundered Onecoin Money Denied New Trial
description: A judge in the U.S. has rejected a request by a lawyer who laundered $400 million from the Onecoin crypto pyramid to have a new trial. The ruling clears the path for sentencing 54-year-old Mark Scott despite a key prosecution witness admittedly lying in court. Judge Not Convinced in Onecoin Lawyerâ€™s Innocence Despite Lies Told […]

title: Stanford University intends to refund $5.5M received from the FTX foundation
description: In a rapidly evolving situation that interweaves the worlds of cryptocurrency, academia, and art, Stanford University and the Metropolitan Museum of Art have found themselves entangled in the financial web spun by the once-prominent crypto exchange, FTX. Allegations of fund rerouting by family members of FTX’s founder have thrust the entities into the spotlight, prompting ... Read more
